meta.title: Home - Briarcliff Manor Union Free School District

meta.name: description
meta.content: Home - Briarcliff Manor Union Free School District

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Home, Briarcliff Manor Union Free School District
Home - Briarcliff Manor Union Free School District
Home - Briarcliff Manor Union Free School District

body.class: fsLiveMode fsHasHeader fsHasMenu fsHasFooter fsHasOneColumnLayout home fsHasTheme2

li.a: December 4th - Professional Development Day at Briarcliff. Welcome to Applefest!

img.alt: Briarcliff Manor Union Free School District

div.span: Our District motto is “I shall grow and I shall shine.” It is through the care, dedication and diligence of teachers, staff, and parents, that we hope to inspire students to become knowledgeable, skilled, and confident young men and women.
A teacher can ignite the imagination, instill a love of learning, and inspire students to shape their future rather than bend to it.

div.p: An extension of the classroom, a healthy athletic program engages students in the joyful development of skills and a journey through some of life’s most important lessons.

div.span: As stewards of this wonderful school district, the Board of Education strives to promote our school programs and model the importance of civic engagement.
Student success is predicated upon a collaboration between school and home.

p.span: I am amazed by the wonderful things that transpire each and every day – sharing our story is a joy! - @SuperKaish

section.class: fsElement fsPostElement fsSlideshow home-news fsThumbnailOriginal fsThumbnailMedium fsItemCount_6 fsSlideshowHorizontal

div.p: Follow the registration steps 1-6 on our website including the student registration form (step 3)

article.a: Continue Reading about Kindergarten Registration is now open.

img.alt: Marine Biology Students at Briarcliff High School are Learning about the Impact of Overfishing

div.a: Marine Biology Students at Briarcliff High School are Learning about the Impact of Overfishing

div.p: Missing fins and broken skeletons are, sadly, among the consequences of overfishing. The students at Karla Constantinou’s Marine Biology class at Briarcliff High School have been learning about this from an educator in Texas via virtual lessons.

article.a: Continue Reading about Marine Biology Students at Briarcliff High School are Learning about the Impact of Overfishing

img.alt: Briarcliff Middle School Staff Holds a Car Parade and Drives Through Town

div.a: Briarcliff Middle School Staff Holds a Car Parade and Drives Through Town

div.p: This past Thursday, April 16th, the staff at Briarcliff Middle School set up their cars in a line at the middle school and held a parade through the neighborhood, much to the delight of students, their families and local community members. Superintendent Dr. James Kaishian was Grand Marshall and the parade was escorted by Police and Fire trucks.

article.a: Continue Reading about Briarcliff Middle School Staff Holds a Car Parade and Drives Through Town

img.alt: Briarcliff High School Students are Experimenting with a Virtual Lab

div.a: Briarcliff High School Students are Experimenting with a Virtual Lab

div.p: One thing we have learned here at the Briarcliff School District in recent weeks is that many subjects can be taught virtually. But what about a science lab that requires hands-on participation? Is there a way students can study virtually and not only learn what’s in the curriculum but also have certain advantages?

article.a: Continue Reading about Briarcliff High School Students are Experimenting with a Virtual Lab

img.alt: Students at Briarcliff High School are Staying Busy During Shutdown

div.a: Students at Briarcliff High School are Staying Busy During Shutdown

div.p: No sports. No after-school activities. No hanging out with friends.

Once their schoolwork is done, many Briarcliff High School students are looking for ways to fill their time during the state mandated school closure. For many, the new schedule has left more time for workouts, relaxing and pursuing hobbies.
Jolie Wasserman and Aiden Rutman saw it as a chance to help others.

article.a: Continue Reading about Students at Briarcliff High School are Staying Busy During Shutdown

div.p: Our technology department created a form that you can use if you have any questions or are having difficulties with the remote learning experience.

article.a: Continue Reading about Technology Support - Remote Learning
